unnormalised: Arre bhai, mhajem SBI account balance itlem kammi asa, ATM-um hastaat! Nimnne txn chai khatir ₹100 aslem, zaite aslem mhaka mhajech chhaan randpachem suru korunk zai.
normalised: Arre bhai, mhojem S-B-I account balance itlem unnem asa, A-T-M-ui hasta! Nimnni transaction ek rupiyo chai khatir aslem, zaite mhunnon hanvuch mhaje apunn chai korunk survat korunk zai.
text: Arre bhai, mhajem SBI account balance itlem kammi asa, ATM-um hastaat! Nimnne txn chai khatir ₹100 aslem, zaite aslem mhaka mhajech chhaan randpachem suru korunk zai.
